verbs.description: i [V: have] never seen such a contentious divisive political season in all my years as a costa mesan for the first time in its 65 year history costa mesa voters will select council members by district launching a potential balkanization of our town pitting one district interests against others naval academy united states navy costa mesan sandra genis parks and recreation commission brett eckles allan mansoor steve mensinger irvine jim righeimer developer katrina foley michelle figueredo wilson manuel chavez andrea marr michelle figueredo - wilson arlis reynolds
